solution_line_template: Total amount spent for athletic shoes and sportswear is ${sneakers_cost} + ${outfit_cost} = $<<{sneakers_cost}+{outfit_cost}={shoes_and_outfit_cost}>>{shoes_and_outfit_cost}.
The price of the racket is ${total_spent} - ${shoes_and_outfit_cost} = $<<{total_spent}-{shoes_and_outfit_cost}={racket_price}>>{racket_price}.
